title: Wild Card Weekend Preview: The Crucible
itunes:title: Wild Card Weekend Preview: The Crucible
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal & Chris Wesseling bring straight to you…THE CRUCIBLE. (02;25) Wild Card Weekend previews including the Titans at Chiefs (06;57), Falcons at Rams (18;45), Bills at Jaguars, (31;26) and the Panthers at Saints (48;52). The heroes share where they were during January 8th, 2000, the last time the Bills were in the playoffs (20;39) and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
